text: I Have Nothing Left To Look Forward ToI graduated from college about a week ago  I should be out celebrating and looking forward to the future  but I m not  In order to celebrate you need to have friends   It took five years to finish my undergrad education  I spent most of my time completely alone  I already have a job and I managed to graduate without any significant debt so it isn t so much that I m overwhelmed as it is I m just empty  I m at a place in my life where I could do anything I wanted and that should be exciting  But I don t care   At the end of the day I come home to my cat  And my cat won t live forever  I have no ambition  no desire to make anything of myself  In the past I stayed alive so I could graduate  stayed alive to see that movie that was coming out next year  stayed alive because maybe the day after I killed myself would be the day I met my future wife  or got hired for my dream job  or finally stopped being sad all the fucking time  But I don t think that day is coming and I don t know if I can bear it anymore  The thought of going home to nothing and watching YouTube videos to numb myself until I have to go to sleep to wake up for work the next day is enough to make me want to kill myself  The truth is I m just tired  I m tired of not fitting in anywhere  I m tired of volunteering  and going to therapy  and going to the gym  and doing all these things that are supposed to help me get better just to feel the same way I ve felt since I was a little kid  I don t want to wake up anymore   With school out of the way  there s nothing for me to look forward to anymore  I graduated  I finally did it  And I feel exactly the same as always
summary: I graduated from college about a week ago. It took five years to finish my undergrad education and I spent most of my time alone. I already have a job and I graduated without any significant debt. I have no ambition and no desire to make anything of myself. I want to kill myself.
cleaned: graduate college week ago take year finish undergrad education spend time job graduate significant debt no ambition no desire want kill

text: What I hate about my brain So  about   weeks ago I got asked out  i said yes  all that fun stuff  She has a weird tech rule in her house  So I cant text her often   Last we talked was about two weeks ago But why I m here writing this now  Is a  the fact it appears both accounts of mine are blocked  my hope is she did it so her dad won t find out  and b  the weird amount of stress from not seeing her that I have   A  her dads a drunkard and her oldest sister still lives with her at the age   severely limiting her and the fact shes the one that does the most work in her house B  since I saw spoke to her last  my brain has been flooded with negative hypotheticals and what if s   because of trauma from previous relationships  And to be honest it s been hell on earth  especially when you check back on their account to see if you can text them  you see their account changed dramatically But I digress  a whole lotta abandonment issues  clinginess  and first world problems  Will I still move forth  Yes  Will it be a struggle not talking to them for so long  Also yes   Thank you for reading if you did
